ValidationRule.description: This VR forces selection of 'Lost Reason' when the status is set to 'Lost'
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( os_Status__c , "Lost"), DateValue(CreatedDate) >= Date(2023, 01,01 ) , ISPICKVAL( os_Lost_Reason__c ,"" ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please select the reason that this Inquiry has been Lost
